summary: Hollywood actor Charles Castle is pressured by his studio boss into a criminal cover-up to protect his valuable career.
cast: Jack Palance|Ida Lupino|Wendell Corey|Jean Hagen|Rod Steiger|Ilka Chase|Everett Sloane|Wesley Addy|Paul Langton|Nick Dennis|Bill Walker|Michael Winkelman|Shelley Winters|Richard Boone|Nick Cravat|Robert Emhardt|Michael Fox|Strother Martin|Robert Sherman|Ralph Volkie|Mel Welles
title: La podadora
